title: Flavours of Malaysia
typeOfFood: Ovo, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Malaysian, Southeast Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run kitchen, food is cooked to order, so veg/vegan requests can be accommodated. Vegans need to specify as some dishes contain fish sauce. Uses organic tofu. Has gluten free. Kitchen breaks from 2:30-4:30pm. Southeast Asian flavors and restaurant decor.
